Package game.actors

Class Player

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Resettable
public class Player extends Actor implements Resettable
Class representing the Player. It implements the Resettable interface. It carries around a club to attack a hostile creature in the Lands Between. Created by:
Author:
Adrian Kristanto Modified by: Ng Yu Mei 32423454 Foo Kai Yan 33085625 Chew Xin Ning 32693974

    • addGuest

      public static void addGuest(GameMap map, Actor guest)
      Add a map that guest spawned from and the guest who are Ally and Invader to the Hash Map.
      Parameters:
      map - A map that the guest on
      guest - An actor who will be removed when the player dies

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Select and return an action for the player to perform on the current turn of the game
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed by the player

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Reset the health point of the player to maximum. If the player dies, runes will be dropped at the last location before the player died, Ally and Invader will be wiped from the map.
      Specified by:
      reset in interface Resettable

    • getIntrinsicWeapon
